name: Tavern floor scouring
description: Scrub the ale-stained floorboards of the local tavern, banishing the grime and echoes of last night's revelry. A humble task for those seeking coin and humility.

name: Dishwashing
description: Plunge your hands into greasy water and cleanse the tavern's mountain of soiled plates and tankards. The work is thankless, but the pay is certain.

name: Library attendant
description: Assist a reclusive scholar in his dust-choked library, sorting ancient tomes and deciphering cryptic manuscripts. Knowledge and coin await the diligent.
